name: Prestart Inspections
Details
Site has been cleaned in advance of our arrival on site
Walls are plumb and level
IMPORTANT
Tiling works running to programme - prior trades completed
Has prior trades QA been signed off by main contractor
Gib compound and sanding cleaned up from rooms
Task Analysis signed onto by tilers and provided to main contractor
Inductions completed
Site Inspection checklist has been completed
All tools tagged and tested - (photo's required)
Tiler has current sitesafe - Input number and expiry
Tiler has correct PPE
Correct drawings supplied as per onsite
QA - Floor Prep Bathrooms
Floor/wall Preparation
Is the area clean, and cleared, ready for necessary preparation
Are flanges installed at correct depth in accordance with specified wastes
Has screeding been completed to shower at correct height and falls - A48 material
All falls to shower base, or outside shower are correct and signed off by site manager
Install shower upstand with Hebel
QA - Waterproofing
Waterproofing
Waterproof materials applied to floor perimeter and gaskets to flanges
Waterproofing coat # 1 applied to floors and walls Ardex WPM750 (take photos)
Waterproofing coat # 2 applied 90 degrees to 1st coat ArdexWPM750 (take photos)
Flood tests, if required, undertaken and photos provided.
QA - Waterproofing - Spa Room
Waterproofing Spa room
Waterproof materials applied to floor perimeter and gaskets to flanges
Apply liquid ARDEX waterproofing to ice bath, plinths & heated seat
Waterproofing coat # 2 applied 90 degrees to 1st coat ArdexWPM750 (take photos)
Flood tests, if required, undertaken and photos provided.
QA - Tiling Installation
Tiling bathroom floor and walls
Tiles set out according to latest drawing - always check revisions on site
Specified product used with notched trowel or required product
Correct spacer size used for spacing as per specs and tile lipping within BRANZ tolerances
Floor/Wall substrate straight, signed off by MC, and ready for installation. (insert notes for remediation if required)
Install 600x600 tile space Corten tiles to bathroom floors
Wall tiles set out to match floor grout lines or as per drawings install tiles to walls
INTAL tiles to hebel upstand
Install 1200x600 tile space corten tiles to shower walls only
Grout nominated is the correct colour and applied evenly and correctly
Grout is consistent throughout and no missing grout.
Tiling completed, checked and Supervisor sign off
Silicone is completed to all tile junctions where required
Area left clean & tidy
Builders clean completed
QA - Crazy Pavers External
Crazy Pavers External
surface grind of substrate prior to installation
prime substrate prior to installation
ensure set out correct as per sheet (1) 04
Install of crazy pavers to external area (Designstore P Trav Czy Trevertine Crazy pavers)
Grout nominated is the correct colour and applied evenly and correctly
Grout is consistent throughout and no missing grout.
Apply 2 coats of Fila sealer to completed crazy paving
Pavers completed, checked and supervisor signed off
Area left clean & tidy
Builders clean completed
QA - Tiling Installation Spa Room
Tiling to spa area
Tiles set out according to latest drawing - always check revisions on site
Specified product used with notched trowel or required product
Correct spacer size used for spacing as per specs and tile lipping within BRANZ tolerances
Floor substrate straight, signed off by MC, and ready for installation. (insert notes for remediation if required)
All Joints to be mitred
Install of crazy pavers to Spa floor area. (Designstore P Trav Czy Trevertine Crazy Pavers)
Install of 1200x600 tiles space corten tiles to vertical Vanity faces
Install of 1200x600 tiles space corten tiles to Heated seat vertical faces and top
Install of 1200x600 tiles to tap plinth vertical faces and top
Install of 1200x600 tiles space corten tiles to Bath vertical faces (external & Internal)
Install of 1200x600 tiles space corten tiles bath floor
Install 1200x600 tiles space corten tiles to bath tops
Tiling completed, checked and Supervisor sign off
Silicone is completed to all tile junctions where required
Area left clean & tidy
Builders clean completed
QA - Other Information
Other Information
Variations or extra works added into folder - all works and materials noted. Use ISSUES tab.
change of details and or instructions
Site specific details to be added
Material Details - Notes to be added of materials used on site
Final Sign Off for Invoicing
Details
No items are left on fail. If so, provide reasons why before invoiced out.
